sources.title: Father's Little Dividend 1951 (Joan Bennett, Elizabeth Taylor) Romance, Comedy | 4k Full Movie
sources.description:
Newly married Kay Dunstan announces that she and her husband are going to have a baby, leaving her father having to come to grips with the fact that he will soon be a granddad. 

Original title: Father's Little Dividend (1951)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/wWjznQN41s4


Director: Vincente Minnelli
Writers: Albert Hackett, Frances Goodrich
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Joan Bennett, Elizabeth Taylor 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Romance
CCC note: sequel to "Father of the Bride" (1950)


This film is available with French, German, Italian & Spanish dubbed audio. 
Go to settings ⚙️ to modify your audio / subtitle language options


00:00 Full Movie
02:08  A man reflects on his life and dreams of taking a trip to Hawaii with his wife after their daughter announces she is pregnant.
08:10  Stanley Banks is shocked to learn that his daughter is pregnant and he will become a grandfather.
16:03  Ellie wants Kay and Buckley to move in with them to help take care of the baby, but Stanley refuses.
20:58  A couple discusses their new house and preparations for their baby.
26:38  A couple discusses potential names for their baby, causing chaos and comedic arguments.
37:37  A woman goes missing after an argument with her partner, causing her family to become worried and search for her.
39:37  A father desperately tries to find his pregnant daughter who has left her husband and is in a fragile emotional state.
51:13  A couple prepares for the birth of their child, facing anxiety and excitement as they rush to the hospital.
1:01:25  A man's initial dislike for his grandson turns into love and acceptance over time.
1:17:00  A man loses his grandson in the park and frantically searches for him.
1:20:00  The video captures the christening of a baby named Stanley Banks and the emotions of the family members involved.
